content: is worked 4 times around a pom pom and custom kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown leather tag complete the look abbrevations for commonly used abbreviations in this and other kelbourne woolens patterns visit useful tips kelbournewoolens com/abbreviations our preferred method of the provisional cast on is the crochet provisional cast-on a full tutorial can be found stitch patterns at kelbournewoolens com/tips-and-tricks/ k1 p1 ribbing in the round over a mult of 2 provisional-cast-on round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * around repeat round 1 for patt for a tutorial on working from charts visit kelbournewoolens com/tips-and-tricks/ working-from-charts ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 2 february hat kkaattee ggaaggnnoonn oossbboorrnn body chart crown chart 42 15 41 14 40 13 39 12 38 11 37 10 36 9 35 8 34 7 33 6 32 5 31 4 30 3 29 2 28 1 27 26 pattern repeat 25 24 23 22 21 20 19 18 chart key 17 16 knit 15 14 purl 13 12 11 slip 1 with yarn in front 10 9 slip 1 with yarn in back 8 7 k2tog - 1 st decrease d 6 5 p2tog - 1 st decrease d 4 3 2 1 pattern repeat ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #kwyearofhats ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved images © linette kielinski v 2 4 25 19 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 4
